name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-29083）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在权限提升漏洞，该漏洞是由于升级功能中的任意文件写入缺陷引起的。攻击者可利用该漏洞获得系统上的提升权限。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://azure-access.com/security-advisories/
patch: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-29083）的补丁
